archimate:Requirement.name: Interoperability Aspect
archimate:Requirement.documentation: An Interoperability aspect is an externally observable characteristic or a set of characteristics to be provided/supported by the solution that fulfills partially or internally a stakeholder interoperability need. (Source: PM2)

properties.value: An Interoperability aspect is an externally observable characteristic or a set of characteristics to be provided/supported by the solution that fulfills partially or internally a stakeholder interoperability need. (Source: PM2)
